attributes.action: Fly the Union Flag on all Government and Tax payer funded buildings.
attributes.additional_details:
The Union Flag is a source of great pride to many of us.
We should celebrate our rich history by flying it on all Government and taxpayer funded buildings.
attributes.background:
We call upon our Government to fly the Union Flag on all Government and tax payer funded buildings (including Scotland).
Furthermore, we urge our Government to encourage all Local Councils and schools to fly the Union Flag.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require the Union Flag to be flown on public buildings and schools!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563467
